modal.title: API Keys
modal.description: Manage your API keys for programmatic access

accordion.title: API Documentation

accordion.description: Access comprehensive documentation to integrate with our API. Choose the format that works best for you.

interactive.title: Interactive Documentation
interactive.description: Browse and test API endpoints with Scalar UI

openapi.title: OpenAPI Specification

form.nameDescription: A descriptive name to help you identify this key
form.successMessage: Your API key has been generated. Make sure to copy it now - you won't be able to see it again.
form.copyWarning: This is your only chance to copy this key. Store it securely - we cannot recover it later.

limitReached.title: API Key Limit Reached
limitReached.description: You have reached the maximum limit of 5 API keys. Please delete an existing key before creating a new one.

list.noKeysDescription: Create your first API key to start using our programmatic API access
list.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This API key will immediately stop working.

errors.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to sign in. Please check your credentials or contact support.
errors.callbackDesc: There was a problem during the authentication callback. Please try again.
errors.configurationDesc: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please contact support if this persists.
errors.defaultDesc: An unexpected error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
errors.domainRestrictedDesc: Access is restricted to @deadpixel.ai email addresses in this environment. Please sign in with an authorized email.
errors.emailCreateAccountDesc: Could not create your account. Please try a different email address.
errors.oauthCallbackDesc: There was a problem with the authentication process. Please try signing in again.
errors.oauthCreateAccountDesc: Could not create your account. You may already have an account with this email.
errors.oauthSigninDesc: There was a problem signing in with your social account. Please try again.
errors.restartProcessDesc: The authentication process needs to be restarted. Please try signing in again from the beginning.
errors.verificationDesc: Please check your email to verify your account before signing in.

layout.headline: Your AI Board of Directors
layout.subtitle: Get perspectives from multiple AI models working together to solve your toughest problems

magicLink.emailSentMessage: We've sent a magic link to {email}. Click the link to sign in.
magicLink.title: Check your email

cancelSubscription.description: Canceling your subscription will limit your access to premium features. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

loss.premiumModels: Access to premium AI models and advanced capabilities

cancelSubscription.termsNotice: By confirming, you agree to the cancellation terms. You can reactivate your subscription at any time before it expires.

timeline.accessUntil: You'll retain full access to all premium features until {date}
timeline.downgrade: After your subscription ends, your account will return to the Free plan
timeline.immediate: No further charges will be made to your account
timeline.title: Cancellation Timeline:

cancelSubscription.title: Cancel Your Subscription?
cancelSubscription.warning: Are you absolutely sure you want to cancel?

success.confirmingPayment: Please wait while we confirm your payment
success.title: Payment Successful!

failure.title: Payment Failed
failure.description: We couldn't process your payment. Don't worry, you haven't been charged.
failure.paymentFailedDescription: Your payment could not be processed. This usually happens due to insufficient funds, card decline, or incorrect payment details.
failure.syncFailedDescription: Your payment was successful, but we encountered an issue activating your subscription. Our team has been notified and will resolve this shortly.
failure.authFailedDescription: Your session expired during payment processing. Please sign in and try again.
failure.unknownErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
failure.noPurchaseFoundDescription: We couldn't find a recent credit purchase for your account. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

commonReasons.title: Common Reasons for Payment Failure:
commonReasons.incorrectDetails: Incorrect card details or billing information
commonReasons.bankRejection: Transaction rejected by your bank for security reasons

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you believe this is an error or if you were charged but still see this message, please contact our support team immediately. We're here to help resolve any billing issues.
support.includeInfo: Please include any error codes shown above when contacting support.

subscriptionChanged.title: Subscription Updated!
subscriptionChanged.upgradeDescription: Your subscription has been upgraded successfully. You now have access to enhanced features and higher limits.
subscriptionChanged.downgradeDescription: Your subscription change has been scheduled. You'll keep your current plan features until the end of your billing period.
subscriptionChanged.changeDescription: Your subscription has been updated successfully.
subscriptionChanged.gracePeriodNotice: Your current plan will remain active until {date}. After that, your new plan takes effect.
subscriptionChanged.noSubscriptionFoundDescription: We couldn't find an active subscription. Please try subscribing to a plan.

models.modelsDeselectedDescription: {models} cannot process images/PDFs and were deselected
models.modelIncompatibleWithFiles: This model cannot process the uploaded images/PDFs. Remove visual files first.

common.maintenance: We're currently undergoing maintenance. Please check back soon.
